head.title: Template dewafollowers lite
head.b:skin: /* Name: Dewa Followers Lite Version: 2.9 (beta) Date: 02/05/2021 Material: Html, Css, Js & Jquery Original: Theme Dewafollowers Prize: FREE Designer: Hazira Azza Faroni Country: Indonesia Website: dewafollowers.com */ .clear{clear:both}.clear:after{visibility:hidden;display:block;font-size:0;content:" ";clear:both;height:0}body {margin:0;padding:0;background:#efefef;font:400 14px Google Sans,sans-serif;text-align:left;}body * {max-height: 9999999em;-moz-text-size-adjust: none;}a {text-decoration: none}.azza-web-content{box-sizing:border-box;background:#ffffff;max-width:1000px;margin:0 auto;padding:0;overflow:hidden;}.azza-head{background:linear-gradient(to right, #7f00ff, #e100ff);width:100%;box-sizing:border-box;margin:0;padding:0;}.azza-head-nav{box-sizing:border-box;padding:20px;margin:0;}.azza-head-nav h1{text-transform:uppercase;color:#ffffff;text-align:left;font-size:20px;margin:0;padding:0;font-weight:600;}.azza-head-nav a{color:#ffffff;}.azza-head-content{width:100%;padding:40px;box-sizing:border-box;}.azza-head-content h2{color:#ffffff;font-size:40px;font-weight:900;margin:0;padding:0;margin-bottom:10px;}.azza-head-content p{font-size:18px;font-weight:400;color:#ffffff;margin-bottom:20px;}.azza-head-content a{display:inline-block;text-decoration:none;background:#ffffff;padding:10px 30px;color:#1F3A93;font-size:18px;font-weight:500;border-radius:25px;cursor:pointer;transition:all .5s ease;}.azza-count{box-sizing:border-box;padding:40px;text-align:center;}.azza-count h2{display:inline-block;font-size:30px;font-weight:800;color:#222222;padding-bottom:10px;}.azza-count-box{max-width:100%;margin:auto;display:flex;justify-content:center;text-align:center;flex-wrap:wrap;}.azza-count-flex{width:25%;padding:10px;box-sizing:border-box;}.azza-count-content{box-sizing:border-box;padding:5px;text-align:center;background:linear-gradient(120deg, #7f00ff, #e100ff);border-radius:10px;}.azza-count-content h3{color:#efefef;font-size:18px;font-weight:800;}.azza-count-number{text-decoration:none;padding:0;margin:0;color:#ffffff;width:auto;font-size:30px;font-weight:900;margin-bottom:20px;}.azza-service{background:linear-gradient(to right, #7f00ff, #e100ff);width:100%;box-sizing:border-box;text-align:center;margin:0;padding:40px;}.azza-service h2{display:inline-block;font-size:30px;font-weight:800;color:#ffffff;padding-bottom:10px;}.azza-service-box{max-width:100%;margin:auto;display:flex;justify-content:center;text-align:center;flex-wrap:wrap;}.azza-service-flex{width:25%;padding:10px;box-sizing:border-box;}.azza-service-content{border-radius:10px;padding:10px;position:relative;}.azza-service-content i{color:#ffffff;font-size:40px;margin-bottom:20px;}.azza-service-content h3{color:#ffffff;font-size:20px;text-transform:uppercase;font-weight:600;margin:0;margin-bottom:20px;}.azza-service-content p{color:#ffffff;margin:0;font-size:18px}.azza-product-wrap{text-align:center;background:linear-gradient(to right, #7f00ff, #e100ff);width:100%;box-sizing:border-box;margin:0;padding:40px;}.azza-product-wrap h2{display:inline-block;font-size:30px;font-weight:800;color:#ffffff;padding-bottom:10px;}.azza-product-box{max-width:100%;margin:auto;display:flex;flex-wrap:wrap;}.azza-product-flex{width:25%;padding:10px;box-sizing:border-box;}.azza-product-grid{background:#ffffff;border-radius:10px;padding:20px;position:relative;overflow:hidden;}.azza-product-grid h3{text-transform:uppercase;font-size:20px;color:#333333;font-weight:800;padding:0;margin:0;margin-bottom:20px;text-align:center;}.azza-product-grid ul{margin:0;padding:0;margin-bottom:20px;}.azza-product-grid ul li{text-align:center;padding:0;color:#444444;font-size:16px;list-style:none;}.azza-product-grid li{margin:0;margin-bottom:10px;}.azza-product-grid ul li span{margin-left:5px;font-weight:600;color:#333333;}.azza-product-grid a{display:inline-block;text-decoration:none;background:linear-gradient(to right, #7f00ff, #e100ff);padding:10px 30px;color:#ffffff;font-size:15px;font-weight:500;border-radius:25px;cursor:pointer;transition:all .5s ease;}.azza-order{box-sizing:border-box;text-align:center;border-radius:10px;overflow:hidden;padding:40px;}.azza-order h2{display:inline-block;font-size:30px;font-weight:800;color:#222222;padding-bottom:10px;}.azza-order-box{background:#ffffff;border-radius:10px;padding:20px;}.azza-order p{text-align:center;padding:0;margin:0;color:#333333;font-size:18px;}.azza-order-content{padding:0;text-align:left;background:#ffffff;margin:0;border-radius:5px;}.azza-order-content .azza-order-gate{padding:5px;margin-bottom:20px;box-sizing:border-box;color:#444;font-size:14px;line-height:1.5;}.azza-order-content .azza-order-gate #text-info span{display:block;padding:10px 18px;text-align:center;font-weight:700;margin:18px 0;border-radius:.5rem;}.azza-order-content .azza-order-gate #text-info span.yes{background:#c6ffc5;color:#0ea904;}.azza-order-content .azza-order-gate #text-info span.no{background:#ffc5c5;color:#ce0404;}.azza-order-content .azza-order-gate .datainput{position:relative;margin:5px 0 20px;}.azza-order-content .azza-order-gate .datainput p{font-size:12px;background:#eee;display:inline-block;padding:5px 18px;border-radius:.5rem;}.azza-order-content{min-height:120px;}.azza-order-content .azza-order-gate .datainput select{padding:18px 0;font-size:18px;width:100%;border:0;border-bottom:1px solid #ddd;outline:none;background:#fff;}.azza-order-content .azza-order-gate .datainput select option{border:none;}.azza-order-content .azza-order-gate .datainput input{font-size:18px;padding:10px 0;display:block;width:100%;border:none;border-bottom:1px solid #ddd;}.azza-order-content .azza-order-gate .datainput input:focus{outline:none;}.azza-order-content .azza-order-gate .datainput label{color:#999;font-size:18px;font-weight:400;position:absolute;pointer-events:none;left:0;top:18px;transition:.2s ease all;}.azza-order-content .azza-order-gate .datainput input:focus~label, .azza-order-content .azza-order-gate .datainput input:valid~label{top:-10px;font-size:16px;color:#007bff;}.azza-order-content .azza-order-gate .datainput input:focus~.bar:before, .azza-order-content .azza-order-gate .datainput input:focus~.bar:after{width:50%;}.azza-order-content .azza-order-gate .datainput input:focus~.highlight{animation:inputHighlighter .3s ease;}.azza-order-content .azza-order-gate .datainput .bar{position:relative;display:block;width:100%;}.azza-order-content .azza-order-gate .datainput .bar:before,.bar:after{content:'';height:2px;width:0;bottom:1px;position:absolute;background:#1F3A93;transition:.2s ease all;}.azza-order-content .azza-order-gate .datainput .bar:before{left:50%;}.azza-order-content .azza-order-gate .datainput .bar:after{right:50%;}.azza-order-content .azza-order-gate .datainput .highlight{position:absolute;height:50%;width:100px;top:25%;left:0;pointer-events:none;opacity:.5;}.azza-order-content .azza-order-gate .azza-confirm-btn{color:#ffffff;background:linear-gradient(to right, #7f00ff, #e100ff);text-decoration:none;padding:10px 30px;border-radius:50px;font-weight:800;font-size:18px;font:400 18px Google Sans,sans-serif;}.azza-question{box-sizing:border-box;text-align:center;padding:40px;}.azza-question h2{display:inline-block;font-size:30px;font-weight:800;color:#222222;padding-bottom:10px;}.azza-question-box{color:#ffffff;font-size:18px;margin-bottom:20px;}.azza-question-quest{background:linear-gradient(to right, #7f00ff, #e100ff);border-radius:50px;padding:10px 30px 10px;font-weight:500;display:flex;align-items:center;position:relative;cursor:pointer;}.azza-question-quest::after{content:"\002B";font-size:2rem;position: absolute;right:1rem;}.azza-question-quest.active::after{content: "\2212";}.azza-question-content{max-height:0;overflow: hidden;transition:max-height 0.2s ease-out;}.azza-question-answer{text-align:left;padding:20px;line-height: 1.5rem;color:#333333;background:#ffffff;}.azza-credit-footer{box-sizing:border-box;width:100%;background:#333333;margin:0 auto;padding:20px;text-align:center;font-size:15px;color:#ffffff;}@media only screen and (max-width:800px){.azza-service-flex, .azza-product-flex{width:50%;}}@media only screen and (max-width:400px){.azza-head .azza-head-content{text-align:center;}.azza-about .azza-about-box{width:100%;margin-bottom:20px;}.azza-about .azza-about-content{flex:100%;}.azza-count-flex{width:50%;}.azza-service-flex, .azza-product-flex, .azza-profile-flex{width:100%;}}
